name: Lost In Space (itch) (Branton Lansdale)
description:
A quick game to test your reaction speed. Your ship malfunctions while speeding through an uncharted territory of space, so you make an emergency landing on a nearby, but unfamiliar planet. You quickly are ambushed by a group of space pirates who have made this small planet their home! Can you take down the space pirates in a duel to escape this treacherous place? Make your way through 4 levels of increasing difficulty to escape. First to 5 points wins the match and unlocks a new difficulty!

The 'Kyle' difficulty is really hard. Let me know if you beat him!

Edit: original version uploaded did not have the final difficulty available. Reuploaded with difficulty available as of a few hours ago.

I streamed most of the development here: https://www.twitch.tv/zaichothepsycho
